translations: 勉强生存，维持生计；赖以活命的食物（或钱）；<法律>有效
自给自足的，仅够自用的

phrs.translation: 勉强糊口的生活水平；贫困生存线；维持生活的最低水平

sentences.sentence: In this cupboard the grandfather kept everything that he needed for his subsistence.
sentences.translation: 爷爷把生活所需的一切东西都放在这个橱柜里。

sentences.sentence: They had no visible means of subsistence.
Many families are living below the level of subsistence.
